item.description:
Some of us decided to explore the local food resources around the Hartford area and since it was such a fun experience we decided to make this into a more public activity.

On January 30th we will be exploring Mediterranean food in the Hartford area. We will be focusing on ingredients and stores that carry Mediterranean food.


  • We will meet at 10:30AM at Penzey’s Spices at 24 Lasalle Rd. West Hartford
  • Our next stop will be Tangiers International market at 668 Farmington Avenue West Hartford
  • Our next stop will be Sayad International market at 95 Fenn Rd. Newington
  • We will end the tour by having lunch at the Greek restaurant Cavos at 2414 Berlin Turnpike, Newington


Hope to see you there!
item.name: Mediterranean food road trip
